snippet.title: Resident Evil 5 - Nintendo Switch Pre-order Trailer
snippet.description:
Evil goes global… and portable! Pre-order Resident Evil 5 and Resident Evil 6, and check out the downloadable demo on Nintendo Switch:

RE5 NA: http://bitly.com/RE5SwitchNA
RE5 EU: http://bitly.com/RE5SwitchEU
RE6 NA: http://bitly.com/RE6SwitchNA
RE6 EU: http://bitly.com/RE6SwitchEU

If you own a digital copy of RE0, 1, or 4 for Switch, you’ll also receive a pre-order discount on RE5 and 6! Plus, the downloadable demo will transfer your progress and unlock costumes for each full game!
---
For more official news and updates, follow us on:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/RE_Games
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/residentevil/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/re_games/
